metadata.title: Thursday, 24th September, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the construction works on the proposed Lusaka-Kapiri Mposhi dual carriageway will commence;
(b)    what the time-frame for the completion of the project is;
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d)    who the contractor is.
(a)    what the number of dentists at the University Teaching     Hospital (UTH) was, as of June, 2015;
(b)    what the recommended staff establishment for dentists at     the UTH is;
(c)    whether the Government sponsors any students to study     dentistry; and
(d)    if so, how many are sponsored annually.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    who the legal owners of the former Astra Cinemas piece of land in the Kitwe Central Business District are;
(b)    why the plot has remained undeveloped for over fifteen years; and
(c)    when the plot will be developed.
(a)    when construction of the Provincial Police Administration Office Block in the North-Western Province will commence;
(b)    who the contractor for the project is;
(c)    what the total cost of the project is; and
(d)    what the time-frame for the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works,     Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the grading of the Chasato-Chikwa road in Chama District will be completed; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in completing the exercise.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and         Housing
parts: (a)    who the contractor engaged to undertake the street lighting project in Kaoma Township is;
(b)    whether the Government is aware of the poor quality of works on the project; and
(c)    if so, what measures the Government has taken to redress the situation.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water     Development
parts: (a)    when the electrification of Vubwi District by the Rural Electrification Authority will be completed;
(b)    who the contractor for the project is; and
(c)    what the total cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when Rufunsa Girls Technical School will be electrified;
(b)    what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(c)    what the time-frame for the project is.
(a)    whether the country produces enough beans to meet the demand in the country;
(b)    whether the country has the capacity to produce the national requirements of canned beans;
(c)    if so, why the Government has allowed importation of canned beans; and
(d)    if the country has no capacity, what the deficiencies are.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development,     Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    how many people benefitted from the Social Cash Transfer Scheme from September, 2011 to December, 2014 in the following Constituencies:
(i)    Chasefu; (ii)    Lumezi; and (iii)    Lundazi; and

(b)    if none, when the programme will be extended to the Constituencies above. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (22nd September) - Resumption of Debate - (Mr Chishimba) _________________________
